common.areYouSureContinue: Are you sure you want to continue?

columnForm.title: Create a new column
columnForm.foreignKeyDescription: Adding a foreign key relation will link this column with a column in an existing table.
columnForm.notNullDescription: This constraint will restrict entry of NULL values in this column.
columnForm.uniqueDescription: This constraint restricts entry of duplicate values in this column.

errors.createColumnFailed: Failed to create a new column in "{{tableName}}" table
errors.defaultRequiredForNotNull: Default value is required to populate this field in existing rows as NOT NULL constraint is added

tooltips.setDefaultNull: Set the default value for the column to Null
tooltips.serialValuesReadOnly: Serial data type values cannot be modified
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedSerial: Foreign key relation cannot be created for serial type column
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedBoolean: Foreign key relation cannot be created for boolean type column
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedTimestamp: Foreign key relation cannot be created with this data type
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedJsonb: Foreign key relation cannot be created for jsonb type column
tooltips.fillDetailsForForeignKey: Fill in column details to create a foreign key relation
tooltips.uniqueNotAllowedBoolean: Unique constraint cannot be added for boolean type column
tooltips.uniqueNotAllowedTimestamp: Unique constraint cannot be added for this type column
tooltips.uniqueNotAllowedJsonb: Unique constraint cannot be added for JSON type column

confirmDeleteForeignKey.title: Delete foreign key relation
confirmDeleteForeignKey.message: Deleting the foreign key relation cannot be reversed. Are you sure you want to continue?

confirmChangeForeignKey.title: Change in foreign key relation
confirmChangeForeignKey.message: Updating the foreign key relation will drop the current constraint and add the new one. This will also replace the default value set in the target table columns with those of the source table. Read docs to know more.

editColumnForm.title: Edit column
editColumnForm.warning: Editing the column could break queries and apps connected with this table.

errors.editColumnFailed: Failed to edit a column in "{{tableName}}" table

warnings.defaultValueChangeNotApplied: Changing the default value will NOT update the fields having existing default value

tooltips.disableNotNullForNullDefault: Disable the NOT NULL constraint to set the default value to Null
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedTimestamp: Foreign key relation cannot be created for this data type
tooltips.foreignKeyNotAllowedJsonb: Foreign key relation cannot be created for JSON data type
tooltips.primaryKeyNotNull: Primary key values cannot be null
tooltips.serialNotNull: Serial data type cannot have null value
tooltips.primaryKeyUnique: Primary key values must be unique
tooltips.serialUnique: Serial data type value must be unique

tooltips.serialValuesReadOnly: Serial type values cannot be modified
tooltips.columnReadOnly: Column cannot be edited or deleted
tooltips.uniqueForCompositePrimaryKey: Unique constraint will be added to combinations of values of a composite primary key

confirmDeleteColumn.title: Delete Column
confirmDeleteColumn.message: Deleting the column could affect it’s associated queries/components. Are you sure you want to continue?

errors.invalidRecordId: Something went wrong - Record Id is incorrect
errors.updateCellFailed: Failed to create a new column table "{{tableName}}"

confirmDeleteRows.message: Are you sure you want to delete the selected rows?

empty.filteredDescription: No data found matching the criteria specified in current filters.
empty.defaultDescription: Use Add Row from the menu or directly click on + icon to add a row. You may use the bulk upload option to add multiple rows of data using a csv file.
empty.filteredTitle: 結果が見つかりません

tableKeyRelations.sourceDescription: The current table on which foreign key constraint is being added
tableKeyRelations.targetDescription: The table that contains foreign key column’s reference
tableKeyRelations.actionsDescription: What happens to Source table when Target table is modified
